recipesJson.name: Blueberry Gummy Candy (Pod / MTL)
recipesJson.author: Hexical
recipesJson.description:
#####**Description & Setup**
Sweet & Gummy Blueberry Candy, all with 3 simple concentrates. Edited to be tailored for Pod / MTL Devices. Tested on a Smoant Pasito @ 25mg 15w

#####**Notes**
*I'm only going to note changes I have done, if you want to view the original flavour notes head to the OG*

**WF Blueberry Gummy Candy** - I upped this concentrate by a mere .5%. It just boosted the candiness and gummy feeling a little bit and better incorporated the blueberry in this concentrate with the recipe. 

**FW Blueberry** - I upped this by 1% while adjusting for MTL Devices. I found that the blueberry note was really lackluster in a lower-powered device. This helped immensely with the blueberry flavour. I started at .5% but it was still too in the background to even notice. 

**CAP Jelly Candy** - Upped by .5% to battle the % increases of the blueberries, and to help with the gumminess of the recipe. This probably wasn't 100% needed but hey, it works!

Make sure to leave a review if you enjoyed this recipe, thank you!
